plot: Presenting the filmmaker's subjective view of an afternoon spent in a shopping center, this film ponders about the emptiness of consumerism and the superficiality of human communication.
title: Prizori iz trgovackog centra
plot_es: Presenting the filmmaker's subjective view of an afternoon spent in a shopping center, this film ponders about the emptiness of consumerism and the superficiality of human communication.
plot_en: Presenting the filmmaker's subjective view of an afternoon spent in a shopping center, this film ponders about the emptiness of consumerism and the superficiality of human communication.
